website_summaries.verdict: A mid-level play tunnel that falls on the middle of the price spectrum and comes with 3 components in a size that isn't too big or too small. It comes with a few quality concerns, however.
pros: Features a roomy tunnel with a tent and ball pit on either end
Offers lots of play possibilities without taking up as much space as some larger competitors
cons: A few owners gripe about having a difficult time folding it back up once assembled

customer_reviews.title: Our 1 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: From opening the box, to pulling out all the pieces, watching us put it together, and then playing in it. Or 1 year old is having a blast. We had some ball pit balls already, and he loves moving them in and out of this. Might be the best birthday present for him as I can see a lot of enjoyment coming from this. Package came on time, and was very easy to assemble. Also very durable as our 18 year old crawled through it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: This came in a very small package, and easily folds back up to fit back into the case it came with. Very easy to set up, just pop it out and hook the three pieces together. It doesn't sit as squarely on the floor as I would like, but that's a small price for how good this thing is. I keep the square tent set up all the time, and most of the babies toys will stay in there. It takes about 5 minutes to set up the other two parts. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Spiffy Biff

customer_reviews.title: ... tent and tunnel and it seems to be a good quality and is holding up nicely for my 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: We received this children's play tent and tunnel and it seems to be a good quality and is holding up nicely for my 15 month old grand-daughter's play time. My 6'5" and 6"10" sons even managed to crawl through the tunnel but I have to admit it was a tight squeeze for them! Ha! I love that fact that it will collapse up small so I can put it away when the grandbaby goes home and then I can save it for the next time she comes.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It But Terrible Ball Pit
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an inflatable pool that we were using as a ball pit for our young kids; the pool was leaking and would no longer stay inflated. I though this setup would be good for indoor and outdoor activities. It is for the most part; however, they easily roll it over on itself, even my crawling infant. The balls do not stay inside of it so we are constantly picking them up; much more often than with the inflatable pool. It makes the kids happy but it is more maintenance which is why I gave it four stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: Good but cheap play tents
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, I still use the two tents every now and then. They are easy to set up; a little flimsy and they don’t stand up well anymore (probably because these are impossible to fold back into the bag for storage), but they’re cute and fun. They do the job. My son never liked the tunnel and when I tried it to encourage him I felt how uncomfortable the wiring was, and threw it out. The whole thing connected would not withstand rough play very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the kiddley tent
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that I bought this ball pit tent from Kiddley. The product is great and good quality. The tent helps in keeping the little one engaged and play at one place. It keeps the little one interesting though fits perfectly in one part of my living room. The material of the tent is thin. The clasp that holds the tunnel and the tent gets undone very easily sometimes. But not always. One suggestion would be velcro stickers on the sides of the tent could be replaced by zippers. The tent also allows good air circulation. A must buy and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Srikks

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this toy. 3yr old and 18mo chasing and playing with each other. Sometimes I can't get them out for dinner. Great quality product. One small issue the clasp that clasp the pieces together sometimes get undone when the kids get really active and I have to go back and adjust. Overall great product can't wait for a mini tent camping in the backyard with my daughters playmates.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Used this tent 2-3 times. When folding it up to store it in the bag, a piece of the sharp metal boning poked out of the fabric. Had this happened when the kids were playing in it one of them could have lost an eye. I will be contacting the manufacturer as we have exceeded the return window.
customer_reviews.author: WHZGRY

customer_reviews.title: Works for the price, but eh
customer_reviews.text: It is quite flimsy and the sections tend to come apart as my one year old crawls through, but she does love to play in this and knock it all over the place. I think it may be better outdoors where it can be tethered down (it comes with spikes for outdoor use), but I would not expect this to hold up to multiple kids playing in it at once.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kitties

customer_reviews.title: Cute, lightweight, doesn’t feel very tough.
customer_reviews.text: It was great out of the box, but I bought it as a gift because I couldn’t get to IKEA and buy their tent and tunnel combo. This is SERIOUSLY thinner and less durable than the tent and tunnel from IKEA. It’s been gifted, so I won’t be able to update how long it actually lasted before it rips, but I’m afraid it won’t last long (the one from IKEA is going on 6 years of rough play and cats).
customer_reviews.author: Bandycat

customer_reviews.title: Wire popped out of tunnel
customer_reviews.text: The wire came out of the tunnel after my kids played with it once. They weren't being overly rough with it, either. I'm pretty disappointed. I ordered it to have at my parents' house, so we didn't open it right away, and it's been too long to return on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Desertgirl

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very low quality item. I mean. I guess you get what you pay for. The material is very thin. The tube doesn’t stay and has major falling between the tent and ball pit. There is a major design flaw that one side is see thru. My seven month old thinks he can walk tegu that side and gets tangled up. Would not buy again but wouldn’t return either. I’m sure it will break soon and we’ll spend the money on a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: Heathelovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not for all babies
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble and a little bit more difficult to fold but the bag has the instructions how to assemble and fold to help you.. I liked it and thought my son would love it but my 10month old didn’t.. he wouldn’t go inside.. I think it’s about personality since he loves to be free all over the house.. I had to return it an the service was great as well
customer_reviews.author: Belkis Zuleta

customer_reviews.title: Great first birthday gift! Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Such a great purchase for my son's first birthday. He had such a fun time crawling through the tunnel, playing in the tents and exploring his new playhouse. We purchased balls to put in the square tent and they worked perfectly. Highly recommend this product. Great quality, lightweight and packs down incredibly small. Love it for the backyard and the living room!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 1 year old nephew. He enjoys it since their toy poodle will play in it with him. In fact the dog seems to like it more! Getting balls like those in ball pits to put in one or both of the tent area seems to work well to add to play...hmmm think that could explain their silly dog loving the tunnels and tents as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jwho

customer_reviews.title: Child enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: The square portion didn't fold out all of the way initially so it leaned and appeared warped; however, my husband was able to adjust it and it worked correctly. Otherwise, it set up easily and quickly. Doesn't stay connected as well as I would like and it's fairly thin, but I think it's worth what I paid for it. My child enjoys it, as does the dog haha
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids and the two youngest love it! They are gentle enough that I’m not worried about them ripping it. Now the oldest, 5, crawled in and already tore one of the links to hold the tunnel to the tent. Well give it another week to see if we can keep it or buy a sturdier one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe sturdy immeasurable fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Havent tried to fold it back up but popping it out was a breeze. My puppies loved it! I recommend for all puppies and small dogs like my Bichons. The only thing is the fasteners dont match on the tunnel and the tent holes to have the solid part on top and bottom.. The tunnel sat half on the mesh...But it withstood the traffic like a champ!! I'm really glad I got this for my pups!! So small kids will love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Antolino

customer_reviews.title: This is really fun! Although after a few months of play (not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun! Although after a few months of play (not rough play) the wire that bounds the tunnel broke through on one end. I simply taped it up with electrical tape and tucked it inside but I will have to sew it shut for continued use. My little guy loves the tents and when it's all connected he has a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: A.NzTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 1st birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to family as a 1 yr birthday gift. The kid loved it. I ordered the 400 balls for the ball pit and the dad ordered 400 more! Way too many and balls are everywhere but the kid had a lot of fun so worth every penny. I wasn't there for assembly and use so no comment re ease of assembly or durability.
customer_reviews.author: Travel4life

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Only real complaint is that there is a gap where the tunnel meets the tents, and if you're not careful they come unlatched very easily. My 10 month old is pretty rough on it and there hasn't been any damage so far. Like all of these type of things it's hard to collapse but after 10 tries you get it, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Becca14

customer_reviews.title: Fun play area
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 18-month-old granddaughter. We've tried it all put together with the plastic balls and she likes that. Lately, we've just put up the cube and she really likes that a lot. Thankfully, there are directions on how to fold up each piece and they all fit in the carry case. Putting it up and taking it down goes fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Both tents will not stand on their own, one the floor keeps popping up and the other the top corner keeps folding in. Also was missing the tube. The fabric is VERY VERY thin. The metal rings were already ripping and popping though the fabric before my baby could even use it. Spend an extra ten buck and get this somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pieces can be used separately or together
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!. The pieces can be used individually or connected together. A 1 yr. old and a 4 yr. old both enjoy it. It folds up very compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie809

customer_reviews.title: It worked... For a while.
customer_reviews.text: So we bought it for our grandson to play while his parents bring him in and I have to say, it work... for about 30 minutes. Then the kid got bored, but kids get bored quickly, so we added some plastic balls, and that kept him occupied for another half hour... So there you go.
customer_reviews.author: ZMan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tent set for about four or five months, it has held up really well to my son and dog who also goes in on occasion. My son is about 1 1/2 and he LOVES this thing. It gives him a place to hide which is something he was definitely looking for at this age. I have a hard time folding the square piece but my husband has no issues at all, so it may be just me. I definitely recommend for your toddler!
customer_reviews.author: missmauraaaa

customer_reviews.title: The product is cheap and over priced in my opinion ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is cheap and over priced in my opinion. Even my 14 month that enjoys getting into things didn't even pay attention to it. It's very flimsy.. Also way overpriced. I will be returning, but buyer beware you'll loose $7 for shipping on returns. I wish I would have known. I would have never purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy, Game, Activity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is 2 years old. It is now all she wants to do, play, etc. She loves it and it makes her laugh. We've made up several games with it. The portability is great. Folding is easy, once you get the hang of it. It's suitable for indoor or outdoor. If the back yard was bigger (townhome), we would add on and buy addy'l tunnels and tents. Priced good. Shipped well. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandson for Christmas. Today we took it out of the bag to set up on the carpet. I am so so upset. When I opened the tunnel the netting has rips. Where you attach the sections one of the small pieces came off. It is very flimsy. If one piece fell off I am concerned that others may and could be swallowed.. I wasted my money and wouldn't tell anyone else to buy. One very very disappointed customer!!
customer_reviews.author: catherine dischert

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy stimulation toy!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out well. I ordered it as part of my baby puppies stimulation play yard. It was a huge hit with them. The tunnel gives them a new experience in problem solving (getting from point A to B) and they often take naps in it too. The nylon is tough enough to handle the babies playing and running thru it. This was very affordable, comes with its own storage bag and so simple to set up. Sadly they will out grow it but it has served its purpose to enhance the pups' focus and thinking capabilities. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insert Evil Laughter
customer_reviews.text: Buahahaha, my brother and I tend to find ourselves butting heads pretty often, so I was looking for something kind of obnoxious but not in an obvious way... I coupled this with a big bag of those brightly colored plastic balls, knowing would end up all over his house and yard.... it was a wonderfully cathartic form of petty revenge.... oh, and the kids love it too! Hooray! Good stuff, it's actually really sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: River Mist

customer_reviews.title: Makes Play Time fun
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old Grandson love it. If they're playing while he sat in it watching TV through the opening and I threw in a pillow and little blanket and he took a nap. It tired him out stores away nicely, a little hard to fold the big piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Playset
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful playset, especially for the price. We have had so much fun playing in it. My 1 year old grandson loves it. I put a long rug runner under it because I have hardwood floors and there is no padding on the bottom. It is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Safari Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent for my son. He’s one and has so much fun crawling back and forth. We purchased the balls separate and although they’re a pain to pick up everywhere, he loves them and i really feel like it makes a huge difference to have them. The only thing that i wish was different was how it all connects together and i wish the optional doors had a better closing system than a couple small pieces of Velcro. Other than that, we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the best material
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn’t purchase this. I could fly away if you blew on it. It’s very thin material I can imagine it tearing pretty quickly. Every time my grandson tries to climb in it it flips over so he gets scared and tries to stay away from it for a while. I’m not happy with this product at all
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for sure! Couple downsides are: it is hard to fold! It also bends really easily after the first use (and what kid doesn't just tear through htings like this?) so now when I try to set it up it doesn't stand up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I received this item very quickly. Gave it to the great grandbaby today. He had a great time playing in the tents and tunnel. It was very easy to set and took just moments. The baby will have many hours of fun in this one I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: readingit

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: This play set is complex enough to stay interesting for a long time, but still compact enough that it can fit in our family room without taking up every inch of floor space. We're very pleased with the versatility, and it seems pretty sturdy so far. I'll update if durability because a problem. My one complaint is that I don't think the tunnel attaches to the tents very securely (which looks to be a problem for this type of toy in general). Overall, though, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jpdavis

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive pop up tents and tube...fun for the little one.
customer_reviews.text: This was a quick purchase for our grandson. It put together quickly and we got 100balls which was adequate for it. The way the tube attaches is a little haphazard..little elastic bands with plastic little dowels to slide through. They are a little flimsy so will see how it holds up to the 1.5 year old. It also would not fit much beyond. 3 year old. That being said, for the price, it provided the fun we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money but doesn't stay together...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble but does not stay together. The fasteners to connect are big and only 4 on each part. Its a fine entertaining object but just doesn't stay well. Fine for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old absolutely loves this!!!! He was constantly asking me to make a tent for him out of our table and all of the blankets in the house. Now he has his own tent with a tunnel in his room. He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Fun cheap product; quality not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Kids love it. Only complaint is that taller piece pictured on the left in the photo doesn't sit flat on the floor. From day one it wouldn't fold flat like the shorter end did. This causes it to collapse in on itself when the kids are playing in it, then I have to yell at them to get out so I can fix it. I think a piece inside the fabric is bent the wrong direction so there's no real fix for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This is easily transported and is very versatile in how kids play with it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandchild. He loved it. I gave four stars in the fold up factor because I’m challenged in doing the fold up but am pretty sure a younger generation will have no problem. I love that they can use it all together or piece by piece. I bought a similar product for one of my grandchildren several years ago and it is still enjoyed inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMikiD

customer_reviews.title: For kids older than 2yrs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and u can fold this thing back up easy too. Bought this for my 16 month old but she wasnt too interested but hopefully will be in a few months. Baby brainpower required. This thing is big but doesnt take up too much room, had it setup in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 and 10 month old! They both love it. It's very easy to setup. The only thing that I didn't like was the velcro that is facing outside the tent, it's right in the path where the kids crawl through and it can easily scratch their legs, but easy fix I just cut up a sock and placed it on the velcro parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my little ones for Christmas. They absolutely love it! My 4 year old and one year old can both play together and separately. This was bigger than I thought but that benefits me! The fabric seems pretty sturdy. I love that this came with stakes for the yard so they can play inside and out. Best option for sure! We are using this as a ball pit which makes it that much more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Very compact for easy storage and transport
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact the product is packaged, makes it really easy to take anywhere!! I love the mesh so it doesnt get hot inside and I can monitor my baby is playing safely. It also makes for a great balcony activity as we live in an apartment and cant have patio furniture the baby can climb.
customer_reviews.author: ashly

customer_reviews.title: Plays big but folds small
customer_reviews.text: Easily collapses so can be taken from house to yard, or put in a car to take to park or beach. Amazing how flat this folds! Perfect for young children. Add some plastic balls and you have a complete play area! Each section can be used separately, or together.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Pace

customer_reviews.title: Quality Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for when my granddaughter and nephew come to visit. After the first use we went to put them up and a piece of wire popped thru on the bigger tent. Had to throw it away because it became a safety hazard. Only have the tunnel and the smaller tent left. It wasn't worth the trouble to send back but I wouldn't recommend because of the quality. On a positive note, the little ones do love crawling into the tent and playing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi, Cin, Luci

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried to break it down and put back in the storage bag but so far , very happy. I don't anticipate any problems. I think it is perfect for those small living spaces, like apartments.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: For 2 yrs & under
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel-teepee is quite small and only one child can fit in each end. We have previously purchased a different tunnel-teepee (light blue & pink with butterfly pattern) that was much bigger and our 2 grandchildren could play in each end at a time. It lasted for over 2 years and only one end collapsed after a great deal of abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R.

customer_reviews.title: perfect to keep kids busy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my twin 22 month olds and a 7 year old to play in. I love that I can attach and reattach to different sides or detach and make into two different play areas. This change up keeps the kids always in there toes for the next adventure. We also like it on our porch for outside use as well. Very good buy♡
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So far its keeping the little ones occupied!
customer_reviews.text: Holy tons of fun! My two little guys love it! So far it is withstanding 2 super active boys and hasnt torn or ripped. Definitely a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1st birthday
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters 1st birthday. She's still afraid of it but I believe she'll love it soon enough. Seems like a good set up but I do wish the tubes connected a little better. One side fits pretty good but the other has a decent gap around the tunnel . Overall happy with it , should last a while
customer_reviews.author: kasandra

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Needed directions to fold the cube! May need to wrap the loops twice so it doesnt come apart while the kids play. Not the sturdiest material but what i expected. Kid loves it. We put the tent in his bedroom. He loves to play and even sleeps in it sometimes. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Karns

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all kids
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew loves this, so did his 7 & 3 year old cousins. Hours of fun Inside or outside. Easily twist folds back to fit in it's nice compact zipper pouch. I didn't order balls for this and that's perfectly ok, the kids didn't miss them at all.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit in a Small Apartment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 15 month old after month two of a seemingly endless winter- wanted the poor little guy to have a park experience since it was too cold to go out. Worked like a charm! I think it’s Amazing quality for the price. He loves having his own little world and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece because we have one for my daughter an she loves it. It takes up no space one folded, comes with a carrying bag, and each piece fits into the next and has little ties to tie together so it doesn’t keep separating. The tunnel part isn’t as durable feeling as I thought it might be but other than that a great buy for not that much money. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the cost! Our one year old loves to crawl through it & sit and read in the tent area. We wanted something we could let her explore in that we could then fold & put away & this is it! The folding part takes time to figure out but once you get it, it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st Birthday present 🎁
customer_reviews.text: This was a 1st birthday gift for grandson. He climbed in immediately and has continued to love playing in it. Only trouble with the structure is the attachments for the three pieces don't hold together very well, kind of pull apart. Also, the larger pieces are a bit tricky to get to fold up. I would still highly recommend this structure!
customer_reviews.author: cindy w

customer_reviews.title: Nearly strangled my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler was nearly strangled!! His neck was caught between the tunnel and the main tent. We woke to him screaming and had to break the little T connector to get him free. We were very fond of this until this happened. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Teyu

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 17 month granddaughter and she loved it. I ordered balls for it yesterday since I now know she will go in it and play. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I finally get a break!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 4 year old and 1 year old entertained long enough for me to sit down for once lol! I actually travel with it from CT to Florida! It’s folded up and put in my luggage. Provides lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: kgawrych

customer_reviews.title: Great crawling baby toy
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for appropriate toys for my newly crawling grandson and this has been a HUGE hit. I ordered balls to go with it and he and his daddy have been having lots of fun. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C

customer_reviews.title: Charlotte loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our Toddler granddaughter Charlotte who lives a few hours away. I really cannot answer all your questions but I do know she loves it and makes her mommy crawl through the tunnel with her to play. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters first birthday, we leave it up in the basement and it gives the entire family something fun to play in. It is pretty good quality for the price and SUPER easy to set up and take down. My 4 year old also plays in it - so win win.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for All.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy to set up, and a real ball for the kids. Fair warning: It is a bear to re-pack. But well worth it overall for the kids (and me).
customer_reviews.author: Peter T. Likens

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive in every way
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice. My kids really like crawling through it and it’s perfect for home entertainment. On our second use, there was already a wire poking through the fabric and I really have no idea how to get all the pieces back in the bag. It was inexpensive but it is inexpensive in quality too.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers/kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 16 month old for Christmas and it is perfect! Easy set up, and so far durable. The little ends that go into the loops connecting the tunnel to each tent tend to come off easily, but its not a big deal. My son absolutely loves this and it gives him his own little space to play in. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Kids had fun; poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos (3&1) loved this the first night we got it out for my son’s first birthday. Unfortunately, by the second night, I found a hole in the mesh. Everything worked fine, but a bit bummed about this. Also, the loop holes to keep the pieces together were a bit loose and needed fixed every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jestapilot

customer_reviews.title: Ginormous
customer_reviews.text: This is, well, it’s much much bigger than I was expecting. 😂😂 Good quality and super easy to set up. Haven’t had to break it down yet but seems simple enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby N

customer_reviews.title: Great nephew loves his ball tent and tunnel like the one I posted above.
customer_reviews.text: It was as pictured and easy to assemble, easy to take down and fold, easy to put in bag to store. I would recommend this product and company. My great nephew loves playing in the tent especially because he can stand in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Good value and the kids like it!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this! It’s easy to put up and take down. We use it in our living room and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: TBF2020

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy set up and take down , pretty light so moves easily. Overall great product for our toddler
customer_reviews.author: Samantha gomez

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and fun
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it breaks down for storage and travel. It is easy to set up and each piece can be used together or separately. We use one tent just as my kids reading corner and then the other with the tunnel for play.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: For Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my twin grand babies for Christmas. There Mom showed them a picture of it at our house and the can’t wait to come and play.
customer_reviews.author: port jervis

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit for my 4 year old and 10 month old. It was easy to set up and I did not have to worry about it collapsing while they were playing in it. The only thing I did not like is the instructions for fold it back up are not very clear and it does not work as well. For some reason, we could not get it to fold up properly based on the instructions, which makes putting it away a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: TJZ

customer_reviews.title: HE DEF LIKES IT
customer_reviews.text: My one year old son responded to this right away. He enjoys standing up in the tent part and pushing a rubber ball or his beach ball through the tunnel part. I like the colors on it.
customer_reviews.author: ah

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Set up took seconds. I was surprised at how roomy it is. Much to the delight of my 22 month old, I can sit in the pyramid shaped tent and can even army crawl through the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Came with a small tear but...
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening and setting up the tunnel, I noticed a small tear in the fabric but this thing is so cute and connects together very easily with buttons and loops. I wish I had one of these when I was little!
customer_reviews.author: sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Quarantined Fun
customer_reviews.text: She lives and and her cousins do as well. Keeps her busy while everyone is in the house for the coronavirus.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tent and tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves crawling though the tunnel and use his tent
customer_reviews.author: Danny Martin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: My little one found a lot of joy crawling through a cardboard box like a tunnel. I thought he might enjoy a "real" tunnel and found this toy. It's exactly what I hoped for. He enjoys the tunnel and LOVES the tents! These are lightweight, easy to set up, move around and easy to take down and store. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Raynor

customer_reviews.title: My toddler absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to assemble, fairly ok to pack away. We opted to only order 50 balls so we'd have less to chase at the end of the day. Our toddler absolutely loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little playset it fits nicely behind our rocker and gives our son a fun place to hide and play now that he's a toddler he needs some stuff to do in his room to keep from getting in too much trouble
customer_reviews.author: Daniel And Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot even express in words how much fun the Kiddey Children’s Dual Play Tent with Tunnel is for our girls. They have both been playing in it since it was delivered. We had to bribe them to stop playing long enough to eat dinner.
customer_reviews.author: nancy steinhart

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and folds up to store compactly. Gave one as a birthday gift to a one year old and his mom reported he liked it so much he cried when they pulled him out to go to bed. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter is 17 months old and was coming to visit from out of state. I had NO TOYS at all in my temporary home, but lots of space available. I ordered this along 50 colored balls. The entire purchase was less than $35. I took a chance on this, and it was perfect for her!!! Not sure how it would fare with a whole group of rambunctious kids, but I think it would be probably hold up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price
customer_reviews.text: The little ones enjoy it. However, upon receiving the package and opening it one of the wires to the tent was bent inward . I have not been able to reshape it. How it connects and is put together is a bit flimsy, I am hoping will last a little while with toddler boys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this toy. It is well worth the space it takes for the fun it brings. It does a better than expected job of containing the 400 balls I bought to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: Fun Playset for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Has provided quite a bit of entertainment for our 18 month old grandson along with 200 balls we ordered to put insdie the tube and tent. Easy to fold and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: L Holt

customer_reviews.title: Cube and tube are great but the pyramid is garbage and constantly collapses on itself
customer_reviews.text: Cube and tube are great but the pyramid is garbage and constantly collapses on itself
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and fun
customer_reviews.text: My niece and nephew love it as they can play together. They use it in the house or the patio and they have lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marbe

customer_reviews.title: Great price for lots of fun. Ordered two of these for 2 different great grans. They loved it
customer_reviews.text: Received this product for great grands age 3 and 2. Granddaughter said they enjoyed it so much. She set it up in their playroom put balls in it and they played in it all day long. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara glisson

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor gym and tree fort for my grand daughter on rainy days.
customer_reviews.text: Its big enough for Millie and small enough for the apartment. Lots of places to hide and room for her cousin and best buddie too.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like connect pieces, choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: Goes together easily. But the brown button thing that puts pieces together is a choking hazard if it comes off. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Tent broken the first day, kids played with it for less than an hour. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lgi

customer_reviews.title: Great toy -- our toddler loves it and we even ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy -- our toddler loves it and we even squeeze in and join her sometimes! Great that the tunnel and tents can be separated easily; we've set different parts up in different locations of our house, and she enjoys them all, separately or together.
customer_reviews.author: Teisha J Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: it is exactly what i was looking for my son. he is 3 years and enjoys playing on it..
customer_reviews.author: Josafat Ruano

customer_reviews.title: Successful for Kids aged 4-8
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 4.5 stars if I could, and I would give it 5 stars if the fastners could work a little better. This was a great success with my grand kids. You need at least 400 balls to cover all areas.
customer_reviews.author: Comma

product_meta.title: Kiddey Children’s Play Tent with Tunnel (3-Piece Set) – Indoor/Outdoor Playhouse for Boys and Girls – Lightweight, Easy to Setup (Balls Not Included)
feature_bullets: ARE YOUR KIDS HOME? ARE YOU LOOKING TO OCCUPY YOUR KIDS INDOOR, SO YOU CAN WORK FROM HOME? The kiddey kids play tent is your solution, Will occupy your little ones INDOOR for hours; letting them play in their own playhouse during the long days, this play set is great for pretend play, active play,

♥ – PERSONALIZED PLAY – ♥ Great for indoor and outdoor use, the 3-piece Kiddey play tent can be used as one massive playground set or as individual pieces. You can even add small plastic balls for even more fun. The choice is yours!

♥ – ENHANCED DURABILITY – ♥ Thanks to waterproof, tear-resistant polyester fabric, and improved flexible steel lining, our pop up tent and tunnel are built for crawling, rolling, horseplay and more; and all from multiple kids at a time.

♥ – EASY SETUP & STORAGE – ♥ Each individual piece can be setup and stored quickly and easily thanks to the simple “pop up” design and ground stakes. The tee-pee is large enough for small children to stand up but small when folded.

♥ – FUN WHEREVER YOU GO – ♥ Being a parent or teacher means you live a busy, on-the-go lifestyle. That’s why our tent/tunnel set is safe to use at home, in the backyard, in the classroom and even at the park! ★ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED or YOUR MONEY BACK! ★
